title: Sounds Like You
body:
[C] When I need your empty hand
You [Am] find somebody [C] new
When [C] all the pain turn into blue
There's [Am] nothing I can [C] prove

[C] And when it all has been washed away
[Am] Did not expect to be the hardest part
[C] All our fading silhouettes
[Am] Have gone away

Sounds like [C] you
Sounds like [Am] you
Sounds like [C] you
Sounds like [Am] you
Sounds like [C] you
Sounds like [Am] you
Sounds like [C] you
Sounds like [Am] you 
Sounds like [C] you

[Am] Driving miles in the [C] city dawn
[Am] All the ghosts turn into [C] smoke
[Am] There is nothing I can [C] do, I can [Am] do [C]
bodyLyrics:
When I need your empty hand
You find somebody new
When all the pain turn into blue
There's nothing I can prove

And when it all has been washed away
Did not expect to be the hardest part
All our fading silhouettes
Have gone away

Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you
Sounds like you 
Sounds like you

Driving miles in the city dawn
All the ghosts turn into smoke
There is nothing I can do, I can do
